thread.title: Ronnie Wood revels in being a new dad at 70 as he clowns about with twins on holiday
thread.title_full: Ronnie Wood revels in being a new dad at 70 as he clowns about with twins on holiday

author: Janine Yaqoob
title: Ronnie Wood revels in being a new dad at 70 as he clowns about with twins on holiday
text:
Celebs Ronnie Wood revels in being a new dad at 70 as he clowns about with twins on holiday Veteran Rolling Stones and The Faces guitarist knows it’s only rock ’n’ stroll – but he likes it Share Ronnie Wood and wife Sally walk their twins around Barcelona (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ronnie Wood knows it’s only rock ’n’ stroll – but he likes it. 
The veteran guitarist looked like he was taking parenthood in his stride on a holiday in Barcelona, Spain with wife Sally, 38, and their twin daughters. 
Gracie Jane and Alice Rose were born in May. 
In December we reported how Rolling Stones and The Faces star Ronnie was in the best shape he'd been in for years after cutting down on sugar and being placed on a strict sleep schedule by his wife. Read More Ronnie Wood's wife puts him on strict sleep schedule - just like their baby twins Rocker Ronnie keeps one of the girls entertained (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) Ronnie is now a dad of seven after the girls' arrival last year (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) The couple looked in good spirits as they walked around Barcelona (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) Ronnie reckons he's in the best shape he's been in for years after cutting down on sugar (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) 
And despite turning 70 last month the rocker looked to have it all in hand as he kept one of the girls entertained in her pram. 
Father-of-seven Ronnie sure is the Daddy of them all. Read More Ronnie reckons he's in the best shape he's been in for years after cutting down on sugar (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) Gracie Jane and Alice Rose were born in May (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) Ronnie says he's taken to running to give him the energy to keep up with the tots (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) Ron looks to have it all under control (Photo: Santi Delgado / Splash News) Like us on Facebook
